author: Jos'e L. Balc'azar
title: Rules with Bounded Negations and the Coverage Inference Scheme
window: being able to generate exactly the same set of rules that would be found at the chosen support and confidence. We describe next such a notion of cover, due to [CS], who applied it to a synthetic dataset and to the Mushroom database. We describe the results of employing this cover strategy on the databases Car (which is close to synthetic) and Contraceptive Method Choice, with real-world data coming
